wissim.controller.filters.gui.editor

    wissim.controller.filters.gui  
    wissim.controller.filters.gui.editor  
  • Classes in wissim.controller.filters.gui.editor used by wissim.controller.filters.gui 
    Class and Description
    FilterEditor 
  • Classes in wissim.controller.filters.gui.editor used by wissim.controller.filters.gui.editor 
    Class and Description
    ChoiceMatch 
    ChoicesListModel 
    ChoicesListModel.Choice
    Instances in the model are wrapped as Choice objects, with added information on the stringfied representation of the object -null if the content is rendered- and the position on the model when is sorted alphabetically.
    EditorComponent 
    EditorComponent.Controller
    The JTextField is controlled via this interface.
    EditorComponent.TextController
    Parent class of controllers with text enabled edition.
    FilterArrowButton 
    FilterEditor 
    FilterEditor.EditorBorder
    Implementation of the Border associated to each filter editor.
    FilterEditor.EditorFilter
    Wrapper of the filter associated to the EditorComponent, ensuring some added functionality (like auto-adding to the history list when the filter changes).
    FilterListCellRenderer 
    HistoryListModel 
    IChoicesParser 
    PopupComponent 
    PopupComponent.EditorBoundsWatcher
    Class to track changes in position or size on the popup's editor.
